title: Crock Pot Beer Cheese Dip
directions: 1. Place ingredients into a slow cooker and place over high heat for about 1 hour, stirring every 10 to 15 minutes. Adjust seasonings.
2. Serve beer cheese dip with chips, pretzels, etc.
ingredients: 12 ounces Happy Farms Cream Cheese, softened
3 cups Happy Farms Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese
Clancy’s Party Size Wavy Potato Chips
